remarks: The predicate "is a (unital) ring."  Definition of ring with unit in [Schechter] p. 187.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
isring.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isring.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
isring.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
isring.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isring $p |- ( R e. Ring <-> ( R e. Grp /\ G e. Mnd /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B A. z e. B ( ( x .x. ( y .+ z ) ) = ( ( x .x. y ) .+ ( x .x. z ) ) /\ ( ( x .+ y ) .x. z ) = ( ( x .x. z ) .+ ( y .x. z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .x. x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
